üë®‚Äçüíª **About Abhishek Mehta:**

Abhishek is a dedicated Full-Stack Developer with a strong focus on backend development. He completed his Master's in Computer Applications from Chandigarh University in 2024 and has been working as a MERN Stack Developer since graduation.

**Professional Journey:**
‚Ä¢ Started with a solid academic foundation in computer science
‚Ä¢ Specialized in backend and full-stack development
‚Ä¢ Gained hands-on experience with modern web technologies
‚Ä¢ Passionate about building scalable, efficient applications

**Current Focus:**
‚Ä¢ Building robust backend systems
‚Ä¢ Exploring AI/ML integration in web applications
‚Ä¢ Learning DevOps and cloud technologies
‚Ä¢ Contributing to open source projects

**What Sets Him Apart:**
‚Ä¢ Strong problem-solving skills
‚Ä¢ Attention to system performance and scalability
‚Ä¢ Continuous learning mindset
‚Ä¢ Experience across multiple technology stacks
‚Ä¢ Ability to work on both frontend and backend

**Vision:**
To create innovative solutions that leverage modern technologies while maintaining focus on performance, scalability, and user experience.
